markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact ([auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16))    **Effect**  You can raise the conch to your lips and blow into it, letting out a long, rumbling note. For the next minute, you and all allies who were within 30 feet of you when you activated the conch gain a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks to Swim and can breathe under water.
name: Interact (auditory)
